item.title: How to correctly add custom crowns
item.dc:creator: @Destruction Destruction
item.description:
@Destruction wrote:

Does this allow you to add more crowns? Like a donator crown? Or does it just replace the old ones? And if it replaces the old ones, why not just do it with Tom’s Cache Suite? It’s much easier :/[br][br][size=1]Posted on: November 24, 2009, 01:12:16 pm[/size][hr][quote=“Rixxx, post:2, topic:210729”]client.java:15: <identifier> expected public static int fwdbwd;mod ^ 1 error Finished! Press any key to continue . . .

How do I fix that error? I removed ‘mod’ and I was greeted by 4 more errors.[/quote]

Remove ‘mod’ after the ‘;’

Read full topic
